renewable energy.Description: Solar power is a renewable energy source that harnesses the energy from the sun to generate electricity.
Wind energy is a renewable energy source that converts the kinetic energy of wind into electricity through wind turbines.
Hydroelectric power is a renewable energy source that generates electricity by harnessing the energy of flowing or falling water.
Geothermal energy is a renewable energy source that utilizes heat from the Earth's core to generate electricity or heat buildings.
